title: One Day at a Time
description: ****Rockin' Country 1.5****  Celebrity Couple. Perfect in the public eye; imperfect in private. Perfectly imperfect for each other.  Reaper and Harmony are finally off the road and ready to just be Garrett and Hannah. Excitement turns into fear when they start to learn more about each other. Gone is the glitz and glamour of hotel rooms and living on the road.  Now itâ€™s real-life, and they have to learn how to deal with one another on a day-to-day basis.  Will they be able to withstand the pressure, or will they fold under the weight of the public machine?  They know the only thing they can do is take it one day at a time
author: Laramie Briscoe
